alert.note: Alert for Monona (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 2:19PM CST until January 19 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 25 to 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of west central Iowa and east central and northeast Nebraska. * WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday to 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
